story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_0200_:
She’s full of energy, considering she just battled
Team Flare.
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_0400_: Hey. ♪ Tell me, where did you and Looker meet?
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_0500_:
How did you end up spending time at the Looker
Bureau together?
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_0600_:
Well, my friends and I were hanging out in our
secret base...
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_0700_:
And then Mr. Looker came around and said he
wanted me to be his assistant!
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_1100_:
Are you worried about that mysterious Pokémon
people are spreading rumors about?
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_1200_:
Yeah, I was just wondering if someone might have
already found it.
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_1300_:
I’m curious as well. We could split up into two
groups and—
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_1400_: Whaaat? No way! Let’s all go together!
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_1600_: A-all right... We’ll be around till the end.
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_1700_:
Mimi would be happy if everyone went
together, too!
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_1900_:
Hehe! ♪ You’re so in sync with your
partner Pokémon!
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_2100_:
Oh, are you not? I assumed because you’re
always together...
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_2200_: Nope! My partner Pokémon is Crobat!
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_2300_: Mimi is my very special friend!
story_teamflare_01_05000/2401_1001_2400_: You and Mimi get along very well! ♪
